website_summaries.verdict: It doesn't do much more than make calls, but the Sonim XP Strike is Sprint's toughest push-to-talk cell phone.

customer_reviews.title: Came with no charger, The charger plug is different ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with no charger, The charger plug is different. Before one buys a phone, make sure it comes with some form of charger, can't use it. Later I did get the charger, and it does work. I had Sprint turn on the Direct Connect or Push to talk. I updated the profiles and PRL, and it works. Works great. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Z Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: power loops
customer_reviews.text: could not use it because it would power loop instead of turning on
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: It's a great basic phone for those who are hard on their ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this phone. He, of course, promptly threw it in the pool and then pulled it out and called me. <It's on video> He's gone swimming with it several times, and I'm sure dropped it. It's a great basic phone for those who are hard on their phones.
customer_reviews.author: R Racho

customer_reviews.title: havn't had it long enough to give a total rating ...
customer_reviews.text: havn't had it long enough to give a total rating...my husband doesn't think the call sound is loud enough...I think it is...the ringer is loud if u have it all the way up...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone was is in pretty good condition
customer_reviews.text: Phone was is in pretty good condition, but had some error message that goes off every 15 minutes. Pretty annoying. Overall, in great condition and does everything it should.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas VanNote

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product because my job entails me to work with heavy equipment. This phone is strong and sturdy. I like the ruggedness feel of the phone. I don't like too much the choices on the ringtones. I like the easy instructions to follow on how to use it. I recommend this phone for those who work outside!
customer_reviews.author: Senaida Chavana

customer_reviews.title: This phone is like new, fully functional
customer_reviews.text: This phone is like new , fully functional , great buy , no doubt !! Thanks David's wireless for the greatest costumer service ..
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Jay

customer_reviews.title: Tough but...
customer_reviews.text: Tough rugged phone but thick and heavy. Low volume on calls. Does not have speakerphone setting. Call history only shows the last call from a number, not previous calls. A non-standard charger.
customer_reviews.author: EasterLemming

customer_reviews.title: sonim xp strike
customer_reviews.text: this phone is great loved it when I got it but it proved its ruggedness when it had went threw a snow blower on a john deere utility tractor into the snow bank and it still works with very little damage some of the plastic around the edge of the phone was cut ant is still water proof, (it sat in the snow bank for a month because I could not find when I found it just charged it and it was good as new )
customer_reviews.author: Zach Doty

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Employer obligates us to use this piece of junk (buttons have no tactile feedback, and it's hard to tell if the Talk button is pushed). And now the screen stays on when the phone is off and I am trying to charge it....What's the point of charging the phone with the screen on??? All the power goes to the screen, not to the battery. Just garbage, and the failure to turn on/off is common knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bausch

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: I have to. Carry this brick all day as the company i work for issued them to us. It is way too heavy, too thick, an all around burden to lug around. Combine that with the sprint network who services it and you Have the worst phone ive ever owned. The 2 way comunication is terrible. Its not like nextel. They tried and failed.
customer_reviews.author: tom

product_meta.title: Sprint Sonim XP Strike Rugged GPS Push To Talk Phone
product_meta.description: The Sonim XP Strike XP3410 is an extra rugged phone that can withstand any type of weather conditions. It has a large 1950 mAh battery that has a talk time of 9.5hours and can stay on standby up to 800 hours. It has an internal storage of 512MB that can still be expanded via micro SD card. It has a 2MP rear camera with LED flash, night mode, a timer, and exposure controls. Other features include GPS navigation, Bluetooth and 3.5mm audio jack.
feature_bullets: Certified to 810G for resistance to dust, shock, salt fog, vibration, temperature extremes, humidity, and blowing rain,

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars16 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
